name: Salamander Tanks PvP
description:
Salamander Tanks is a split-screen game you can play with friends and family for FREE.  The objective of each match is simple, eliminate the opponent's tank.

You play on a fun little map with obstacles to hide behind and bump into, and the controls are simple and confined to one keyboard (WSAD and Space for the top tank and Arrow Keys and Enter/Return for the bottom tank.)

Show your siblings who is the better gamer, or let your crush win to lighten the mood. No controllers or extra computer needed just one PC and Keyboard.
